mapper.select: select * from ( select TOP ${rows} * FROM ( SELECT TOP ${start} * from VirtualManager ORDER BY id ASC ) as t1 ORDER BY id DESC ) as t2 ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.insert: insert into VirtualManager (Code, Name, User1, Priority1, User2, Priority2, User3, Priority3, User4, Priority4, User5, Priority5, User6, Priority6, User7, Priority7, User8, Priority8 ) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority7,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority8,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update VirtualManager set Name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, User1 = #{record.user1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Priority1 = #{record.priority1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, User2 = #{record.user2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Priority2 = #{record.priority2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, User3 = #{record.user3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Priority3 = #{record.priority3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, User4 = #{record.user4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Priority4 = #{record.priority4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, User5 = #{record.user5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Priority5 = #{record.priority5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, User6 = #{record.user6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Priority6 = #{record.priority6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, User7 = #{record.user7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Priority7 = #{record.priority7,jdbcType=INTEGER}, User8 = #{record.user8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Priority8 = #{record.priority8,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
